turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a couple of pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, I'd like three medium pizzas. Could I have them all be meat lovers pizzas with gluten free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 3 medium gluten free meat lovers pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking up in store, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes, please just show them your receipt which will be texted to your shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you very much. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, no. That would That would be all. Thank you very much.
